4318530.name: BOMCAT Original Soundtrack
4318530.description:
An original soundtrack by Captainmirai, also known for his work as a Vocaloid producer.
We’ve packed it with energetic, feel-good tracks that faithfully recreate the wavetable game sounds once heard in 1980s arcades.

Highlights include “BOMCAT Theme – 2151 Overdrive,” driven by FM synthesis, “Drive My Meow – Back to 1983,” which simulates the sound of a legendary hardware platform released in 1983, and the full-on dub mix “Bomb Factory Overdrive – DUBCAT Groove.”
A solid lineup of bonus tracks rounds out the album.
